body:
I've heard and referred to as Ice lollies as, well, ice lollies all my life. Today I learned they're referred to as popsicles here in the US ;-;
So, y'all know of anything in English that varies/ is unique to regions that you dont find particularly unique?
For me, it's: "Y'all", "Crawdads", "petrol", "lorry", and probably other stuff which I can't name right now :c

title: Popsicle vs Ice Lolly?
